website_summaries.verdict: Good-looking flexible bag in a pretty pink print.
pros: Large bag that holds a lot of stuff
cons: A bit too heavy for air travel

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, sturdy, and quite roomy make-up case. I was undecided on this or a train case but if you prefer a bag that is flexible and is not clearly marked a make-up case then this is the one. It is nice and spacious and can hold quite a lot of make-up. The drawers inside are removable and the bag can be used for other than a make-up case. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Love Japan

customer_reviews.title: ... the trays are well-made and slide in and out easily. Definitely a bargain at this price - holds ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very roomy bag - the trays are well-made and slide in and out easily. Definitely a bargain at this price - holds loads of stuff but organized so you don't have to dig for what you need. Great gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: JCH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks as stated, huge though, check size reference before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT BUY. ENOUGH STORAGE AND PULL OUT DRAWERS. LOVE THE ALIGATOR LOOK ASWELL
customer_reviews.author: sydney gaye

customer_reviews.title: They absolutely loved them. The quality was very good and couldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought four of these for Christmas presents for my girls. They absolutely loved them. The quality was very good and couldn't believe all the room there was for all their makeup. One of my girls travels on her job. I recently ask if she was still happy with her bag. She replied, "It's my constant companion!"
customer_reviews.author: F. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Large and holds a great deal
customer_reviews.text: This case holds an encredible amount of makeup. Most of my things fit in here. I use this case for going to events where I’ll have a bunch of diverse looks, or for storing non-day-to-day makeup. Great size for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Big, beautiful and pink.
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love. This case is perfect. It's deep enough for my various bottles to stand upright even when the trays are closed. The only thing I might want, that isn't there, is a handle to lift the tray compartment out. But that's not a big problem. Did I mention I love the pink?
customer_reviews.author: Sandra B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag but it is heavy when empty. Lots of space for a lot of makeup.
customer_reviews.author: tammie hayden

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case! It came bigger than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Excellent case! It came bigger than I expected, but it holds all of my makeup perfectly (with room to spare). Love it!
customer_reviews.author: RMusic

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Holds and organizes all my products in ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Holds and organizes all my products in one convenient place!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Powell

customer_reviews.title: So far so good and it's even cuter in person 😬
customer_reviews.text: So cute, I've it it for a few months but I'm just now using it. So far so good and it's even cuter in person 😬
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: Good bag lots of space and great price well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: candy greene

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: super great, holds all the makeup I have as a pro makeup artist, seems sturdy and well designed...
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag, it helped me condense my professional makeup kit down to the things I need for onsite bridal looks.
customer_reviews.author: MRSB

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: It's HUGE! Love the design. Holds a decent amount of make up. Definitely would recommend this case!
customer_reviews.author: Katryna212

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and easy to travel with
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased months back and this is used everyday! Very durable and easy to travel with. It holds a lot of makeup! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: annajohnson

customer_reviews.title: She's happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the wife as a christmas present. We were surprised at the size as it seemed bigger than we thought it would be. She's happy with it, so I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ciupek-Reed

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bag with true color
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy bag with true color! I ordered the pink. I thought that the bag would be smaller but I kept it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Rene Morris

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made! Perfect for my jewelry party in a bag!
customer_reviews.author: JewelzVI

customer_reviews.title: Am I love with this case
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for traveling.. is not to big not too smal can hold all a maximum amount of makeup
customer_reviews.author: kameca baxter

customer_reviews.title: Mrs Brown loves it! Plenty of room for smoke ...
customer_reviews.text: Mrs Brown loves it! Plenty of room for smoke and mirrors! LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Carson Brown

customer_reviews.title: I love it as well
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my friend and she really loves it. I love it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Lata

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute and very versatile
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, great service and I would buy from Yescom again.
customer_reviews.author: K.M.Branson

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: I was actually surprised by this bag. It's a lot bigger than I thought, and it's certainly sturdy. It looks more expensive than what it is, too. The interior shelves are a little flimsy (when you go to pull them out), so I'd be a little careful with that. This whole gizmo would be pretty useless if the drawers didn't work! Oh, and one other thing. This is pretty heavy WITHOUT anything in it. Just be aware of that before you start piling your makeup in (and btw, it holds a lot of stuff!)
customer_reviews.author: Katy Lake

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: This bag is huge. No matter how many reviews state this fact, it's one thing to read and another to see it. I like the color and shape but it's not something I'll be traveling on a plane with. Hence the name train bag I guess. I have mine set up for road trips and it holds everything I need. The only thing I don't like a lot is the top opening. The flap keeps wanting to come back over unless you open it all the way and have enough space to let the flap hang to the side. As someone noted it's perfect for sewing material or craft projects.
customer_reviews.author: akas

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup case
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this. Bought it for her as a Christmas gift last year and filled it with age-appropriate makeup for her. It is quite roomy, the expanding insert comes out easily to transform it into an overnight bag, and I love the look as well.
customer_reviews.author: N. Cree

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Built like a mini suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Built like a mini suitcase. I didn't realize how big it was gonna be. In fact, I think there was two sizes. I wanted the smaller one. I ordered the large one by mistake. Anyway. Still love it, I just have to refigure what i will use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy Bev

customer_reviews.title: I really like the way it opens and seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I'm looking forward to using this on my next vacation. I really like the way it opens and seems sturdy. It's quite spacious and should hold everything I need and then some for a small carryon.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Bucci

customer_reviews.title: buy because like a man who is useless but handsome :)
customer_reviews.text: Adorable & well made, but far too small for professional carry case to appointments . Use for something else .
customer_reviews.author: Susié Rimmel

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great size, really sturdy, well made. Bought one for my daughter and one for my sister, both makeup fanatics. This holds their travel stuff really nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture, good quality and multi functional I actually use mine for sewing supplies
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. Love the drawers that come out like ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Love the drawers that come out like a fishing tackle box. Fits a lot too. I use it for cosmetics I carry and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kendal Boatwright

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and texture. Works perfectly to carry the costume jewelry that I sell. So spacious!
customer_reviews.author: TrishJ823

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Makes traveling so much easier, everything has a place, and a place for everything..Plus it is very chic!
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: Nice BUT...
customer_reviews.text: Nice, but the stitching on handles immediately came undone at first use.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Sutton

customer_reviews.title: It's Niiicce!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got my cosmetic case and I Love, Love, Looovvve IT!!! The stitching is done well, the compartment are padded, it's very roomy and it opens up in away that one side will not tip to one side if unbalanced. I love the way it zips up , its classy, and a spice to carry when U travel for the price I paid. I'm thinking of purchasing these cases for my customers, so it would be really great if it came in a bone color and red as well. My case came well packaged so it had no damages. I definitely recommend this cosmetic case and I will be purchasing more provided that the quality stay superbly the same!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this makeup bag....
customer_reviews.text: this bag is more lovely than I expected..size is great quality is also. I love mine so much I got one for a xmas gift also...if you are thinking of getting this bag do it it is well worth it..
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: This bag is awesome. Great quality and large to hold enough makeup ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome. Great quality and large to hold enough makeup and accessories for my daughter who is on a dance team. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: What every girl needs
customer_reviews.text: It's just the right size to carry everything you need!
customer_reviews.author: Federico

customer_reviews.title: broken or May not look like the image
customer_reviews.text: Was a little hesitant that I’ll receive something use,broken or May not look like the image. But once again I was wrong! Keep in mind guys try not to read too much reviews it’s only going to make you turn your cheeks to something else. This makeup product fit all my makeups plus more. I can always pickup & go.
customer_reviews.author: Rosé

product_meta.title: AW Pink Crocodile Makeup Train Bag Handbag Case w/Removable Tray Cosmetic Jewelry
product_meta.description:
Brand New Professional Makeup Train Case with Shoulder StrapElegant Design: Soft PVC Body with Pink Crocodile Print!
This pro makeup case features a removable large base compartment and 4 extendable trays. It's the perfect choice for organization of all your cosmetics. Completes with handle and shoulder strap great for traveling and outdoor use. It's really a must for makeup artists and hairdressers. 

Features: 

Brand:AW 
Soft PVC Body with Pink Crocodile Print 
Lightweight - Weighs about 4.6 Pounds - Great For Travel 
Detachable Reinforced Comfortable Shoulder Strap 
Removable Inside Solid Case with 4 Top Extendable Trays 
Large Bottom Storage Compartment 
Black Foamed Nylon Insulate Lined for Easy Cleaning 

Specifications: 

Overall Dimensions: 11 1/2"L x 9 1/2"W x 10"H 
Removable Inside Case Dimensions: 11"L x 8 1/4"W x 7 1/2"H 
Each Tray Dimensions:11"L x 4"W x 1 1/2"H 
Bottom Portion Dimensions:11"L x 8 1/2"W x 4 1/2"H 

Package Includes:

1x Makeup Train Case 
1x Shoulder Strap
feature_bullets: Soft PVC Body with Pink Crocodile Print Makeup Train Case with Shoulder Strap
Lightweight - Weighs about 4.6 Pounds - Great For Travel
Removable Inside Solid Case with 4 Top Extendable Trays
Black Foamed Nylon Insulate Lined for Easy Cleaning
